dmca.title: [Ticket#2007042010000209] DMCA Complaint from LG Electronics for thenewconnection.com
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 23, 2007 7:40 AM
To: Response, Legal; Copyright
Subject: FW: [Ticket#2007042010000209] DMCA Complaint from LG
Electronics for thenewconnection.com

 

ThePlanet,

 

Thank you for having your client remove all of LG logos and copyrighted
images from the URL's provided, but in order to comply fully your client
needs to remove all of the copyrighted images and/or trademarked logos
of LG from there entire website. This case will remain open until this
request is satisfied in full.  I have pasted all infringing URL's below
to better assist in reaching compliance.  If you should need any further
assistance let me know and I will do my best to provide you with the
needed information.  

 

TEXT VIOLATIONS

 

http://www.thenewconnection.com/vi-51900________LG-50PC1DRA-50-quot;-.ht
ml

http://www.thenewconnection.com/vi-52169________LG-42LB1DRA-42-quot;-.ht
ml

 

 

Thank you,

 

Barbara Davis

LMS Manager

Net Enforcers Inc.

BDavis@netenforcers.com 

compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......

Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be
legally privileged.  This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient.  If you have received
this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of
this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.

 

 

-----Original Message-----
From: Compliance Management
[mailto:compliance.management@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Friday, April 20, 2007 2:21 PM
To: Barbara Davis
Subject: Re: [Ticket#2007042010000209] DMCA Complaint from LG
Electronics for thenewconnection.com

 

 

Your Ticket-Team

 

 -

 Barbara Davis 

 

--

 Super Support - Waterford Business Park

 5201 Blue Lagoon Drive - 8th Floor & 9th Floor - Miami, 33126 USA

 Email: hot@example.com - Web: http://www.example.com/

--

---- Forwarded message from legal-response@theplanet.com ---

 

From: legal-response@theplanet.com

To: compliance.management@netenforcers.com, copyright@theplanet.com

Subject: DMCA Complaint from LG Electronics for thenewconnection.com

Date: 2007-04-20 08:30:03

 

> To Whom It May Concern:

> 

> This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your

> below-pasted complaint has been disabled.

> 

> Legal Response Team

> The Planet

> 

> 

> 

> ---------

> 

> 

> Please see the attached PDF. 

> 

---- End forwarded message ---
